resources.string: Please choose an account to use:

string.name: explore_io_msg_cards_ask_opt_in
string.description: This message is displayed on the Explore I/O screen to ask users whether they would like to opt in to receive messages regarding the conference.

resources.string:
Conference Messages
Would you like to opt-in to receive important messages about the conference? Messages are time based and may include promotional messages from partners.
Whoops, we couldn\'t process that request.
